TopicTitle: KSP Weekly Mystery IVAs- Start guessing!

Articles.Content: If you have seen the March 14 KSP Weekly, there are two IVA teasers. The actual command pods the IVAs are for aren't shown. Let the guessing BEGIN! Personally, I think the first IVA is a wide FOV module, and the second one is for a part to use on manned rovers.
1st is the IVA for the KSPX (now to be stock) Panopticon. 2nd is the 1 man lander can (also from KSPX).
It's the Cupola style and the one man lander can
KSPX is going to be stock now?! First mod to be fully implemented into the game! WOOHOO!
I don't know if the whole mod is (I doubt it) but it looks like those two things will be.

no need to guess, we already know, the devs can't keep any secrets from us

KSPX won't likely be fully implemented (yet), but I bet we'll also see the 2.5m "Atlas" engine in 0.20.

no need to guess, we already know, the devs can't keep any secrets from us

KSPX won't likely be fully implemented (yet), but I bet we'll also see the 2.5m "Atlas" engine in 0.20.

Now we can recreate the Mercury-Atlas launches.

KSPX is going to be stock now?! First mod to be fully implemented into the game! WOOHOO!

Actually, the C7 pack was the first.

KSPX is going to be stock now?! First mod to be fully implemented into the game! WOOHOO!

It's not the first mod to be implemented into stock; that honor goes to C7's aircraft parts.

At any rate: the first one is definitely the cupola module, as that was established in the text below it. The second one is likely the 1-man lander can, as its window design is very similar to the 2-man lander can.

It's not the first mod to be implemented into stock; that honor goes to C7's aircraft parts.

I never knew the aircraft parts were from a mod. The more you know... The possibly 1 man lander can could also work with rovers. They should add in command pods specifically for rovers soon.

It's called Kerbal seats.

thank you for giving me something to shoot for in my lunar base...what mods?

thank you for giving me something to shoot for in my lunar base...what mods?

b9 aerospace for legs and railings. KSPX for the cupolas. tri-strut pack for the tri struts and engines. the launch vehicle used stuff from the novapunch pack and the jool V rocket, but the same delta-v could be achieved with other parts I'm sure.
